CustomField.description:
We can determine whether it's a soft pull or not by inspecting LASERCA__Credit_Report_Log__c.LASERCA__Login_Account__c.
Soft Pull: bluewavesoft Hard Pull: Bluewave2
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this checkbox to pull a credit report using the Soft Pull Transunion account, instead of a the Hard Pull account
CustomField.label: Soft Pull Credit Report
